meanings.definition: Showing or suffering from nervousness, fear, or a lack of confidence.
meanings.sent1: The timorous kitten hid behind the couch during the thunderstorm.
meanings.sent2: She felt timorous about speaking in front of the large audience.
meanings.sent3: The timorous squirrel cautiously approached the bird feeder, unsure of the other animals around.
meanings.sent4: His timorous heart raced as he entered the haunted house on Halloween night.
meanings.sent5: The timorous student hesitated before raising their hand to ask a question.
